title: MACP Learning Log Schema
description: Schema for the learning_log.json file in the MACP protocol.

session_id.description: Unique identifier for the learning session.

date.description: The date of the learning session (YYYY-MM-DD).

agent_id.description: The ID of the agent conducting the learning session.

topic.description: The main topic or question of the session.

summary.description: A summary of the key insights and takeaways from the session.

paper_ids.description: A list of paper IDs referenced during the session.
